## Clinical Pharmacologist & Researcher

Working at the intersection of personalized medicine and pharmacology

[Research](research.html) | [Publications](papers.html)

## Recent projects

**VISION-TDM**
A study optimizing venetoclax and ibrutinib dosing through therapeutic drug monitoring, combining retrospective analyses with prospective clinical data.

**SAMSON2**
A study to examine statin intolerance using a N-of-1 trial design

**CYP2C19 Pharmacogenetic Testing**
A study evaluating the clinical utility of CYP2C19 genotyping in clopidogrel therapy through both retrospective analysis and prospective patient data.

## Technical Expertise

- **Statistical methods:** Survival analysis, generalized additive models
- **Programming:** R ([**data.table**](https://rdatatable.gitlab.io/data.table/), [**heaven**](https://github.com/tagteam/heaven), [**mgcv**](https://github.com/cran/mgcv))
- **Data sources:** Danish health registers, clinical databases
